entry.title: New Github Organization
entry.content:
Hey everyone!

I've finally come up with a brand name for all my Sui-related activities.

Meet Suiware, a new Github organization that now hosts all my open-source projects related to Sui.

I've also renamed the Discord server and created an X account for the organization. The best way to support my open-source work now is to subscribe to these channels.

Thank you!

entry.title: Sponsored bounties for ETHSofia Hackathon 2024
entry.summary: My team got to the finals of the Walrus Breaking the Ice hackathon, which meant we earned $500 bounty.
entry.content:
My team got to the finals of the Walrus Breaking the Ice hackathon, which meant we earned $500 bounty. I decided to spent my part on incentives for ETHSofia hackers who would build on Sui with Sui dApp Starter.

Now when the hackathon is over, I'm happy to announce the winner of the Sui dApp Starter reward of 100 SUI...

Meet DefyRent - a Decentralized Rent Deposit Platform.

Congratulations to the team and good luck with future advancement of the project!

entry.title: Won the 1st prize at Sui Overflow Hackathon 2024
entry.summary: After a few months of active development and experimentation, Sui dApp Starter is among the winners of the Sui Overflow hackathon.
entry.content:
After a few months of active development and experimentation, Sui dApp Starter is among the winners of the Sui Overflow hackathon.

I'm happy to share the great news that Sui dApp Starter has won the 1st place in the Randomness category of Sui Overflow 2024!

Now it's time to celebrate by minting your own random Sui dApp Starter Greeting NFT!

We still have a long road of improvements and new features ahead of us, so stay tuned!
